titleStmt.title: A supplement to the Popish Courant annex'd to the weekly pacquet of advice from Rome: Friday October 14. 1681. In a dialogue between Trueman and Tory.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Janeway, in Queens-Head-Alley in Pater-Noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
